quote: He liked the Leedses. He was sorry that he had been to the morgue. He thought the madman who visited them might have liked them too. But the madman would like them better the way they were now.
quote_letters: HE LIKED THE LEEDSES HE WAS SORRY THAT HE HAD BEEN TO THE MORGUE HE THOUGHT THE MADMAN WHO VISITED THEM MIGHT HAVE LIKED THEM TOO BUT THE MADMAN WOULD LIKE THEM BETTER THE WAY THEY WERE NOW
